meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 47
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the third week of November 2021

pageProps.content:
• Yann Lecun's Deep learning course is available for free.
  • How twitter process billions of events in real time.
  • Netlife drop: Drag and drop a folder with your siteâ€™s HTML, CSS, and JS files. Netify will publish them live and give you a link to share it.
  • Hidden cameras can be detected using time of flight sensors.
  • Sound a post on Sass billing dark patterns.
  • Amazon Ion is a richly-typed, self-describing, hierarchical data serialization format offering interchangeable binary and text representations. The text format (a superset of JSON) is easy to read and author, supporting rapid prototyping.
  • Learned containers.
